Bitter.Rice.1949.1080p.Criterion.Bluray.DTS.x264-GCJM

=======

aka
Riso Amaro

Francesca and Walter are two-bit criminals in Northern Italy, and, in an
effort to avoid the police, Francesca joins a group of women rice workers.
She meets the voluptuous peasant rice worker, Silvana, and the soon-to-be
discharged soldier, Marco. Walter follows her to the rice fields, and the four
characters become involved in a complex plot involving robbery, love, and
murder.
